description:
Randall is the tall, lean, cute, bashful type.
He admits that it is hard for him the make the first move.
“I’m a sweet guy,” he said. “It’s hard for me to get my courage up.”
“Do you usually have to be asked out?” I said.
He laughed. “Yeah, that’s usually how it is.”
I think Randall is absolutely adorable. He was shy about taking off his shirt, but when he did I was impressed!
He’s got a lanky, toned build, with olive skin and a little hair on his chest.
Randall started to rub himself through his pants, and I could tell he was ready.
“Let’s see what you’ve got there,” I said softly.
I was impressed again! He’s got a really nice dick with a wicked curve to it, and a nice, full, dark bush!
title: Randall
